# Galactic cosmic ray abundances at 1 AU, normalized to Si=100 compared with the solar system and LIM
# energy intervals in MeV/nucleon
# Data from Longair 'High Energy Astrophysics' Volume 1 2nd ed. Table 9.1
# the solar abundance is not in the table for some reason, but is in Figure 9.4b
# CR (70-280)  CR(600-1000)  CR (1000-2000)  Solar      Local galactic
41700  3000    27030  580    -      -        2          0.27e6  0.06e6
100    6       136    3      -      -        5.0e-3     -       -
45     5       67     2      69,4   10       8.1e-5     -       -
210    9       233    4      212    10       3.5e-3     -       -
851    29      760    16     684    27       1110       1300    300
194    8       208    5      188    6        231        230     100
777    28      707    15     607    28       1840       2300    500
18.3   1.3     17.0   1.1    13.5   2.3      0.078      0.093   1.6
112    6       113    3      100    3        240        270     1.7
27     3.4     25.8   1.1    21.3   3.2      6          5.6     0.9
143    6       142    4      125    12       106        105     3
25.2   3       28.2   1.2    22.2   3.2      8.5        8.4     0.4
100    0       100    0      100    0        100        100     3
4.0    0.7     5.3    0.5    5.3    1.6      0.65       0.96    0.2

3.6    0.5     6.4    0.5    4.7    0.4      0.47       0.47    1.6
